name: Flappy Corn
description:
Flappy Corn

Here is a short demonstration of the game.




Overview For those who miss the game "Flappy Bird" and want to play it in a cute way on the playdate. You play as a unicorn, which tries to avoid choclate. If you crack the highscore the unicorn will get some sweets.

After the start scene you fly right away through the chochlate bars. After you avoid specific amount choclate the choclate bars go faster through the game.

The latest five highest scores will be displayed after the game is over. There is a little easter egg as well.

When you have cracked the highscore, you can enter your name. The last name you entered will be saved even if you close the game! So you don't have to enter it every time. But if a friend wants to play the game too, you don't have to worry about your score, only if the friend would beat it.

How to playThis game is very simple and can be played even by children.

You have to press the A button when you want to jump and that's it!

When you jump, you will hear a sound that signals it. You can turn off the jumping sound in the menu if it bothers you.
